name: Guardian Duty
description:
Lore:

You are a Guardian Angel. The job pays well, the hours are nice, and it has dental, but it comes with a downside: Mondays. Today is Monday. That means it’s your shift for Guardian Duty. For the next 24 hours, you need to give it your all to protect a worthy soul, a humble farmer named S. Coartie.

As it happens, S. Coartie is making his way to market to sell some hay. On his way, he is passing through a particularly nasty forest, full of evil Fey, creatures of the night, and fearsome being: a Dragon.

Go forth, and protect S. Coartie!

Instructions:

The monsters will try and attack S. Coartie by charging at him or shooting projectiles. You must defeat the monsters before they kill him. You can block projectiles with your sword, which gives you mana to cast useful spells to dispatch with the monsters. You can kill the monsters with your sword, but the spells do much more damage. Use your mana wisely and keep S. Coartie safe!

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Select spells: Number Keys (1-7) or Scroll Wheel

Aim: Move mouse

Use a spell: Right Click

Use sword: Left Click

Spells:

  1. Smite: Fire a quick projectile that hits for low damage.
  2. Light of Torment: Deal moderate damage to enemies in front of you.
  3. Growth of Sword: Enhance your sword’s speed, power, and size for a short time.
  4. Aura of Damage: Conjure a damaging aura around yourself that harms enemies for a short time.
  5. Tornado: Create a Tornado to redirect enemy attacks.
  6. Heal: Restore 10 points of S. Coartie’s health.
  7. Planar Sanctification: Kills every enemy and removes all projectiles on screen
